widget.name: AutoLoadMore
widget.description: Place below a listview to automatically load more content when reaching the bottom of the page.

property.caption: Interval
property.description: Check whether the "load more" button needs to be clicked each X millseconds. Default 250ms.

property.caption: Preload Factor
property.description: A factor to adjust how early content is loaded. A value of 1 means the load more button is clicked when first visible. 1.5 means it starts half a screen height earlier. 2 means it loads one full screen height early.
